page.title: 14CLUBS IN THE BALFRON AREA
page.content: A great variety of{clubs}to cater for all tastes and ages, from the pre- school playgroup right through to the "Wednesday Club" for senior citizens, exists in Balfron. Badminton,football, rugby,bowling,snooker,keep-fit,summer- ice,swimming,whist,Women's Rural Institute,Scouts,Cubs,Guides,Brownies, Boys' Brigade,Youth Clubs and others, are all available and well attended. One particular club which interests us is the{Riding for the Disabled {Association}which has a group in Balfron, called the Endrick Valley Group. It is a{charity club,}where handicapped people are taught to ride, giving them a freedom of movement which their own arms and legs cannot give them. Handicapped children from primary and secondary school attend weekly for riding lessons, except when the weather is very cold.
